item.description:
Hello, this is Windsor.


Look in 'Files' you can print i out from there. Just open it and print. I have like 20 copies if you don't know how to print your copy. I'll be there at 5:30pm waiting for any others that want to meetup.

Once your in the main lobby, there might be a line there but just call me at my cellphone # 6174358177 and I'll be most likely with someone from the group.

First 2 can head up and start a line for us and the rest at the main lobby until it reaches 6:30pm. We can all head up together to search for 2 members who arrived early.

UnderWorld: Rise of the Lycans Trailer
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing next to the escalator in the main lobby.
item.name: UNDERWORD: RISE OF THE LYCANS - Advance Screening Movie
